QuestionText: What will happen if you are caught cheating on the knowledge test?

Options.text: You will never be allowed to take another test.
You will not be allowed to take another test for 6 weeks.

QuestionText: Are you required to carry your driver's licence with you every time you drive?

Options.text: No, it is only needed on long trips.

QuestionText: You are driving on a freeway and realise you forgot something at home. You want to go back for it. Can you do a U-turn on this road?

Options.text: Yes, providing you use the gravel joining roads.

QuestionText: Where there is parallel kerbside parking, are you allowed to double-park alongside a parked vehicle?
When displaying L or P plates, how much of the letter must be clearly visible?

Options.text: All of the letter L or P.
Only enough of the letter so it is clear whether it is an L or P.
